transcript: I pitched ilila on working with me on our first date I was like listen we can make a lot of money together even if we aren't in love I just kept harassing her for the first three weeks that she should put her job and joined me and then she did I'd say that we have a very atypical relationship and that it's weird because we're just like very clear communicators and like these are our agreements a lot of people are like off I can't believe it's so transactional like yes it's transactional you get more than you pay and I get more than I pay and we're both happy and if one of us doesn't hold up our into the agreement we'll terminate the contract but until now it's been good I always joke I'm like Lea and I are month to month we just said we have an auto R CLA
